verses.verse: וַיְהִ֣י <S%H1961><s%> came אַֽחֲרֵיכֵ֡ן <S%H310><s%> It came to pass after this בָּ֣אוּ <S%H935><s%> came בְנֵי־ <S%H1121><s%> also [that] the children מוֹאָב֩ <S%H4124><s%> of Moab וּבְנֵ֨י <S%H1121><s%> and the children עַמּ֜וֹן <S%H5983><s%> of Ammon וְעִמָּהֶ֧ם ׀ <S%H5973><s%> together מֵֽהָעַמּוֹנִ֛ים <S%H5984><s%> and with them [other] beside the Ammonites עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> against יְהוֹשָׁפָ֖ט <S%H3092><s%> against Jehoshaphat לַמִּלְחָמָֽה׃ <S%H4421><s%> to battle

וַיָּבֹ֗אוּ <S%H935><s%> Then there came וַיַּגִּ֤ידוּ <S%H5046><s%> some that told לִֽיהוֹשָׁפָט֙ <S%H3092><s%> Jehoshaphat לֵאמֹ֔ר <S%H559><s%> saying בָּ֣א <S%H935><s%> There cometh עָלֶ֜יךָ <S%H5921><s%> against הָמ֥וֹן <S%H1995><s%> multitude רָ֛ב <S%H7227><s%> a great מֵעֵ֥בֶר <S%H5676><s%> against thee from beyond לַיָּ֖ם <S%H3220><s%> the sea מֵאֲרָ֑ם <S%H758><s%> on this side Syria וְהִנָּם֙ <S%H2009><s%> and behold בְּחַֽצְצ֣וֹן תָּמָ֔ר <S%H2688><s%> and behold they [be] in Hazazontamar הִ֖יא <S%H1931><s%> he עֵ֥ין גֶּֽדִי׃ <S%H5872><s%> which [is] Engedi

וַיִּרָ֕א <S%H3372><s%> feared וַיִּתֵּ֧ן <S%H5414><s%> and set יְהוֹשָׁפָ֛ט <S%H3092><s%> And Jehoshaphat אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> פָּנָ֖יו <S%H6440><s%> himself לִדְר֣וֹשׁ <S%H1875><s%> to seek לַיהוָ֑ה <S%H3068><s%> the LORD וַיִּקְרָא־ <S%H7121><s%> and proclaimed צ֖וֹם <S%H6685><s%> a fast עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> throughout כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all יְהוּדָֽה׃ <S%H3063><s%> all Judah

וַיִּקָּבְצ֣וּ <S%H6908><s%> gathered themselves together יְהוּדָ֔ה <S%H3063><s%> And Judah לְבַקֵּ֖שׁ <S%H1245><s%> to ask מֵֽיְהוָ֑ה <S%H3068><s%> [help] of the LORD גַּ֚ם <S%H1571><s%> even מִכָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all עָרֵ֣י <S%H5892><s%> even out of all the cities יְהוּדָ֔ה <S%H3063><s%> of Judah בָּ֖אוּ <S%H935><s%> they came לְבַקֵּ֥שׁ <S%H1245><s%> to seek אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> יְהוָֽה׃ <S%H3068><s%> the LORD

וַיַּעֲמֹ֣ד <S%H5975><s%> stood יְהוֹשָׁפָ֗ט <S%H3092><s%> And Jehoshaphat בִּקְהַ֧ל <S%H6951><s%> in the congregation יְהוּדָ֛ה <S%H3063><s%> of Judah וִירוּשָׁלִַ֖ם <S%H3389><s%> and Jerusalem בְּבֵ֣ית <S%H1004><s%> in the house יְהוָ֑ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD לִפְנֵ֖י <S%H6440><s%> before הֶחָצֵ֥ר <S%H2691><s%> court הַחֲדָשָֽׁה׃ <S%H2319><s%> the new

וַיֹּאמַ֗ר <S%H559><s%> And said יְהוָ֞ה <S%H3068><s%> O LORD אֱלֹהֵ֤י <S%H430><s%> God אֲבֹתֵ֙ינוּ֙ <S%H1><s%> of our fathers הֲלֹ֨א <S%H3808><s%> not אַתָּֽה־ <S%H859><s%> you ה֤וּא <S%H1931><s%> he אֱלֹהִים֙ <S%H430><s%> [art] not thou God בַּשָּׁמַ֔יִם <S%H8064><s%> air וְאַתָּ֣ה <S%H859><s%> you מוֹשֵׁ֔ל <S%H4910><s%> reign בְּכֹ֖ל <S%H3605><s%> all מַמְלְכ֣וֹת <S%H4467><s%> [not] thou over all the kingdoms הַגּוֹיִ֑ם <S%H1471><s%> Gentile וּבְיָדְךָ֙ <S%H3027><s%> your hand כֹּ֣חַ <S%H3581><s%> [is there not] power וּגְבוּרָ֔ה <S%H1369><s%> and might וְאֵ֥ין <S%H369><s%> no עִמְּךָ֖ <S%H5973><s%> against לְהִתְיַצֵּֽב׃ <S%H3320><s%> so that none is able to withstand

הֲלֹ֣א ׀ <S%H3808><s%> not אַתָּ֣ה <S%H859><s%> O אֱלֹהֵ֗ינוּ <S%H430><s%> [Art] not thou our God הוֹרַ֙שְׁתָּ֙ <S%H3423><s%> [who] didst drive out אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> יֹשְׁבֵי֙ <S%H3427><s%> the inhabitants הָאָ֣רֶץ <S%H776><s%> of this land הַזֹּ֔את <S%H2063><s%> likewise מִלִּפְנֵ֖י <S%H6440><s%> before עַמְּךָ֣ <S%H5971><s%> thy people יִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <S%H3478><s%> Israel וַֽתִּתְּנָ֗הּ <S%H5414><s%> and gavest לְזֶ֛רַע <S%H2233><s%> it to the seed אַבְרָהָ֥ם <S%H85><s%> of Abraham אֹֽהַבְךָ֖ <S%H157><s%> thy friend לְעוֹלָֽם׃ <S%H5769><s%> alway

וַיֵּשְׁב֖וּ־ <S%H3427><s%> And they dwelt בָ֑הּ וַיִּבְנ֨וּ <S%H1129><s%> therein and have built לְךָ֧ ׀ בָּ֛הּ מִקְדָּ֖שׁ <S%H4720><s%> thee a sanctuary לְשִׁמְךָ֥ <S%H8034><s%> therein for thy name לֵאמֹֽר׃ <S%H559><s%> saying

אִם־ <S%H518><s%> Should תָּב֨וֹא <S%H935><s%> cometh עָלֵ֜ינוּ <S%H5921><s%> and רָעָ֗ה <S%H7451><s%> If [when] evil חֶרֶב֮ <S%H2719><s%> upon us [as] the sword שְׁפוֹט֮ <S%H8196><s%> judgment וְדֶ֣בֶר <S%H1698><s%> or pestilence וְרָעָב֒ <S%H7458><s%> or famine נַֽעַמְדָ֞ה <S%H5975><s%> we stand לִפְנֵ֨י <S%H6440><s%> before הַבַּ֤יִת <S%H1004><s%> this house הַזֶּה֙ <S%H2088><s%> this וּלְפָנֶ֔יךָ <S%H6440><s%> and in thy presence כִּ֥י <S%H3588><s%> שִׁמְךָ֖ <S%H8034><s%> (for thy name בַּבַּ֣יִת <S%H1004><s%> house הַזֶּ֑ה <S%H2088><s%> this וְנִזְעַ֥ק <S%H2199><s%> assemble אֵלֶ֛יךָ <S%H413><s%> to you מִצָּרָתֵ֖נוּ <S%H6869><s%> unto thee in our affliction וְתִשְׁמַ֥ע <S%H8085><s%> then thou wilt hear וְתוֹשִֽׁיעַ׃ <S%H3467><s%> and help

וְעַתָּ֡ה <S%H6258><s%> Now הִנֵּה֩ <S%H2009><s%> behold בְנֵֽי־ <S%H1121><s%> And now behold the children עַמּ֨וֹן <S%H5983><s%> of Ammon וּמוֹאָ֜ב <S%H4124><s%> and Moab וְהַר־ <S%H2022><s%> and mount שֵׂעִ֗יר <S%H8165><s%> Seir אֲ֠שֶׁר <S%H834><s%> whom לֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> did not נָתַ֤תָּה <S%H5414><s%> whom thou wouldest not let לְיִשְׂרָאֵל֙ <S%H3478><s%> Israel לָב֣וֹא <S%H935><s%> invade בָהֶ֔ם בְּבֹאָ֖ם <S%H935><s%> when they came out מֵאֶ֣רֶץ <S%H776><s%> of the land מִצְרָ֑יִם <S%H4714><s%> of Egypt כִּ֛י <S%H3588><s%> סָ֥רוּ <S%H5493><s%> but they turned מֵעֲלֵיהֶ֖ם <S%H5921><s%> and וְלֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> and did not הִשְׁמִידֽוּם׃ <S%H8045><s%> from them and destroyed

וְהִ֨נֵּה־ <S%H2009><s%> see הֵ֔ם <S%H1992><s%> like גֹּמְלִ֖ים <S%H1580><s%> Behold [I say how] they reward עָלֵ֑ינוּ <S%H5921><s%> by לָבוֹא֙ <S%H935><s%> us to come לְגָ֣רְשֵׁ֔נוּ <S%H1644><s%> to cast us out מִיְּרֻשָּׁתְךָ֖ <S%H3425><s%> of thy possession אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> which הֽוֹרַשְׁתָּֽנוּ׃ <S%H3423><s%> which thou hast given us to inherit

אֱלֹהֵ֙ינוּ֙ <S%H430><s%> O our God הֲלֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> nor תִשְׁפָּט־ <S%H8199><s%> wilt thou not judge בָּ֔ם כִּ֣י <S%H3588><s%> for אֵ֥ין <S%H369><s%> else בָּ֙נוּ֙ כֹּ֔חַ <S%H3581><s%> them? for we have no might לִ֠פְנֵי <S%H6440><s%> against הֶהָמ֥וֹן <S%H1995><s%> company הָרָ֛ב <S%H7227><s%> this great הַזֶּ֖ה <S%H2088><s%> this הַבָּ֣א <S%H935><s%> that cometh עָלֵ֑ינוּ <S%H5921><s%> against וַאֲנַ֗חְנוּ <S%H587><s%> we לֹ֤א <S%H3808><s%> nor נֵדַע֙ <S%H3045><s%> against us neither know מַֽה־ <S%H4100><s%> what נַּעֲשֶׂ֔ה <S%H6213><s%> what to do כִּ֥י <S%H3588><s%> for עָלֶ֖יךָ <S%H5921><s%> against עֵינֵֽינוּ׃ <S%H5869><s%> but our eyes

וְכָ֨ל־ <S%H3605><s%> All יְהוּדָ֔ה <S%H3063><s%> And all Judah עֹמְדִ֖ים <S%H5975><s%> stood לִפְנֵ֣י <S%H6440><s%> before יְהוָ֑ה <S%H3068><s%> the LORD גַּם־ <S%H1571><s%> with טַפָּ֖ם <S%H2945><s%> their little ones נְשֵׁיהֶ֥ם <S%H802><s%> their wives וּבְנֵיהֶֽם׃ <S%H1121><s%> and their children פ

וְיַחֲזִיאֵ֡ל <S%H3166><s%> Then upon Jahaziel בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> the son זְכַרְיָ֡הוּ <S%H2148><s%> of Zechariah בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> the son בְּ֠נָיָה <S%H1141><s%> of Benaiah בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> the son יְעִיאֵ֧ל <S%H3273><s%> of Jeiel בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> the son מַתַּנְיָ֛ה <S%H4983><s%> of Mattaniah הַלֵּוִ֖י <S%H3881><s%> a Levite מִן־ <S%H4480><s%> at בְּנֵ֣י <S%H1121><s%> of the sons אָסָ֑ף <S%H623><s%> of Asaph הָיְתָ֤ה <S%H1961><s%> came עָלָיו֙ <S%H5921><s%> and ר֣וּחַ <S%H7307><s%> came the Spirit יְהוָ֔ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD בְּת֖וֹךְ <S%H8432><s%> in the midst הַקָּהָֽל׃ <S%H6951><s%> of the congregation

וַיֹּ֗אמֶר <S%H559><s%> And he said הַקְשִׁ֤יבוּ <S%H7181><s%> Hearken כָל־ <S%H3605><s%> all יְהוּדָה֙ <S%H3063><s%> ye all Judah וְיֹשְׁבֵ֣י <S%H3427><s%> and ye inhabitants יְרוּשָׁלִַ֔ם <S%H3389><s%> of Jerusalem וְהַמֶּ֖לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> and thou king יְהוֹשָׁפָ֑ט <S%H3092><s%> Jehoshaphat כֹּֽה־ <S%H3541><s%> thus אָמַ֨ר <S%H559><s%> Thus saith יְהוָ֜ה <S%H3068><s%> the LORD לָכֶ֗ם אַ֠תֶּם <S%H859><s%> you אַל־ <S%H408><s%> not תִּֽירְא֤וּ <S%H3372><s%> unto you Be not afraid וְאַל־ <S%H408><s%> not תֵּחַ֙תּוּ֙ <S%H2865><s%> nor dismayed מִפְּנֵ֨י <S%H6440><s%> by reason הֶהָמ֤וֹן <S%H1995><s%> multitude הָרָב֙ <S%H7227><s%> of this great הַזֶּ֔ה <S%H2088><s%> of this כִּ֣י <S%H3588><s%> for לֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> not לָכֶ֛ם הַמִּלְחָמָ֖ה <S%H4421><s%> for the battle כִּ֥י <S%H3588><s%> but לֵאלֹהִֽים׃ <S%H430><s%> [is] not yours but God's

מָחָר֙ <S%H4279><s%> To morrow רְד֣וּ <S%H3381><s%> go ye down עֲלֵיהֶ֔ם <S%H5921><s%> against הִנָּ֥ם <S%H2005><s%> behold עֹלִ֖ים <S%H5927><s%> against them behold they come up בְּמַעֲלֵ֣ה <S%H4608><s%> by the cliff הַצִּ֑יץ <S%H6732><s%> of Ziz וּמְצָאתֶ֤ם <S%H4672><s%> and ye shall find אֹתָם֙ <S%H853><s%> בְּס֣וֹף <S%H5490><s%> them at the end הַנַּ֔חַל <S%H5158><s%> of the brook פְּנֵ֖י <S%H6440><s%> before מִדְבַּ֥ר <S%H4057><s%> the wilderness יְרוּאֵֽל׃ <S%H3385><s%> of Jeruel

לֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> not לָכֶ֖ם לְהִלָּחֵ֣ם <S%H3898><s%> Ye shall not [need] to fight בָּזֹ֑את <S%H2063><s%> in this הִתְיַצְּב֣וּ <S%H3320><s%> [battle] set עִמְד֡וּ <S%H5975><s%> yourselves stand וּרְא֣וּ <S%H7200><s%> ye [still] and see אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> יְשׁוּעַת֩ <S%H3444><s%> the salvation יְהוָ֨ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD עִמָּכֶ֜ם <S%H5973><s%> your behalf יְהוּדָ֣ה <S%H3063><s%> with you O Judah וִֽירוּשָׁלִַ֗ם <S%H3389><s%> and Jerusalem אַל־ <S%H408><s%> nay תִּֽירְאוּ֙ <S%H3372><s%> fear וְאַל־ <S%H408><s%> not תֵּחַ֔תּוּ <S%H2865><s%> not nor be dismayed מָחָר֙ <S%H4279><s%> to morrow צְא֣וּ <S%H3318><s%> go out לִפְנֵיהֶ֔ם <S%H6440><s%> against וַיהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> them for the LORD עִמָּכֶֽם׃ <S%H5973><s%> your behalf
